content: Once the limit is reached, all users will be added with User permissions only. To be able to add further admins, <1>click here</1> to upgrade your tariff plan.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message when a user's tariff plan is almost reached its limit, informing them that their permissions will be changed to "User" and instructing them to upgrade to add admins. The message appears as a button in the QuotasBar component.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tag `<1>` is inconsistent with standard practice. It's unclear what it signifies. It should be replaced with a more standard HTML tag or removed if it's purely for internal marking.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing `<1>` with a standard HTML tag like `<span>` or `<a>` or remove it entirely if it's just a marker.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'أنقر هنا' is a valid translation for 'click here,' a more natural and common phrasing would be 'اضغط هنا'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'أنقر هنا' with 'اضغط هنا'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "To be able to add further admins" is not accurately translated. "Daha çox administrator əlavə etmək üçün" is too literal and doesn't flow naturally. A better phrasing would convey the purpose of upgrading the tariff plan.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: To be able to add more administrators, consider upgrading your tariff plan.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The link tag `<1>click here</1>` is not standard HTML. It needs to be `<1>click here</1>` or `<1>click here</1>`.  Also, the tag seems unnecessary and might not render properly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace `<1>click here` with `click here` where [link] is the actual URL.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing "tarif planınızı təkmilləşdirin" (upgrade your tariff plan) is functional, but could be more user-friendly. The tone is somewhat formal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more approachable phrasing like "tarif planınızı artırın" (increase your tariff plan) or "abonəyinizə yüksəltin" (upgrade your subscription).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "aktualizujte svůj tarifní plán" (update your tariff plan) doesn't quite convey the meaning of "upgrade your tariff plan".  'Upgrade' implies a move to a higher tier, whereas 'aktualizovat' is more general and could mean simply updating the existing plan.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Zvyšte svůj tarifní plán.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags <1>click here</1> are inconsistent with the original English tags. The original uses `<1>click here</1>`, the Czech translation uses `<1>klikněte zde</1>`. Consistency is important.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Maintain the original tag format: `<1>klikněte zde</1>.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags `<1>` and `</1>` are inconsistent. They should be the same throughout the text.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change `</1>` to `</1>` to match the opening tag.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "To be able to add further admins" is translated as "Voidaksesi lisätä pääkäyttäjiä". While technically correct, a more natural and clearer translation would be something like "Jotta voitaisiin lisätä lisää pääkäyttäjiä" or "Lisää pääkäyttäjiä varten".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Jotta voitaisiin lisätä lisää pääkäyttäjiä

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'to upgrade your tariff plan' is translated as 'päivittääksesi tilauksesi'. While technically correct, 'tariff plan' would be better translated as 'tilaus'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: päivittääksesi tilauspakettiasi

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tag `<1>` is not a standard or widely accepted way to represent a clickable element. It may not render correctly in all systems. A more standard approach would be using an `<a>` tag.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace `<1>click here` with `click here` (replace `[link]` with the actual URL).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "To be able to add further admins" is not accurately reflected in the Armenian translation. "Այլ ադմիններ ավելացնելու համար" is too literal and could be improved for clarity and natural flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like: "եւս ադմիններ ավելացնելու համար" or "եւս ադմինիստրատորներ ավելացնելու համար" or "զ purse ադմինիստրատորներ ավելացնելու համար".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tag `<1>` and `</1>` are inconsistent. The English uses `<1>click here</1>` and the Armenian uses the same, but the numeric indicator should be the same for consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change `<1>` to `<1>` and `</1>` to `</1>` for consistency with the English source.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags `<1>` and `</1>` appear to be used incorrectly to highlight the 'click here' text. This is likely unintentional and should be corrected to use appropriate styling (e.g., `<b>`, `<strong>`, or CSS classes).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Review and correct the HTML tags surrounding 'clicca qui'. Consider using standard formatting or CSS classes instead of `<1>` and `</1>`.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tag `<1>` is inconsistent with the English version. The English uses `<1>click here</1>`, while the Japanese uses `<1>ここ</1>`. This disrupts the intended click area.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure the HTML tag corresponds to the English click text. Replace `<1>ここ</1>` with `<1>こちら</1>` or a similar localized equivalent that accurately represents 'here' as a clickable element.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'To be able to add further admins' is slightly awkward. While technically correct, it could be more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like 'さらに管理者を追加するためには' or 'より多くの管理者を追加するためには'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tag <1> is inconsistent with common practices for indicating interactive elements. It should be replaced with a more standard approach like <a> or a button element.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using an tag with a CSS class or a button element to style the clickable element for better accessibility and maintainability. For example: 여기를 클릭 or

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ເມື່ອບັນຫາຂีดຈຳກັດຖືກບັນລຸແລ້ວ" is a bit awkward. A more natural translation for "Once the limit is reached" might be "ເມື່ອບັນລຸຂີດຈຳກັດແລ້ວ" or "ເມື່ອເຕັມຂີດຈຳກັດແລ້ວ".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເມື່ອເຕັມຂີດຈຳກັດແລ້ວ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ຜູ້ໃຊ້ທັງໝົດຈະຖືກເພີ່ມດ້ວຍສິດການໃຊ້ງານຜູ້ໃຊ້ເທົ່ານັ້ນ' is a bit verbose. A clearer translation of 'all users will be added with User permissions only' would be 'ຜູ້ໃຊ້ທັງໝົດຈະຖືກເພີ່ມສິດເປັນຜູ້ໃຊ້ເທົ່ານັ້ນ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຜູ້ໃຊ້ທັງໝົດຈະຖືກເພີ່ມສິດເປັນຜູ້ໃຊ້ເທົ່ານັ້ນ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ເພື່ອຍົກລະດັບແຜນການສິນຄ່າຂອງເຈົ້າ' is a bit literal. A more user-friendly phrasing for 'to upgrade your tariff plan' would be 'ເພື່ອກວດສອບແຜນການສິນຄ່າຂອງທ່ານ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເພື່ອກວດສອບແຜນການສິນຄ່າຂອງທ່ານ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags `<1>` and `</1>` are incorrect and don't represent standard HTML link tags.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ກົດບ່ອນນີ້

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'To be able to add further admins' is translated as 'Aby móc dodać kolejnych administratorów'. While technically correct, it can be improved for clarity and naturalness in Polish. A more fluent option would be 'Aby móc dodać więcej administratorów' or 'Aby móc dodać dodatkowych administratorów'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aby móc dodać więcej administratorów

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "To be able to add further admins" is translated as "Pentru a adăuga administratori". While technically correct, it's a bit clunky. A more natural translation might be "Pentru a putea adăuga și administratori".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pentru a putea adăuga și administratori

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags `<1>click here</1>` are not correctly translated. The `click here` content should be translated and the tag remain intact.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Odată ce limita a fost atinsă, toți utilizatorii vor fi adăugați numai cu permisiunea de Utilizator. Pentru a putea adăuga și administratori, <1>apasați aici</1> pentru a schimba planul tarifar.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'User permissions only' is translated as 'පරිශීලක අවසර සහිතව පමණක්'. While technically correct, a more natural translation would convey the restriction more clearly. 'පරිශීලක අවසර පමණක්' or 'පරිශීලක අවසරය පමණි' might be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'පරිශීලක අවසර පමණක්' or 'පරිශීලක අවසරය පමණි' for a more natural flow.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'To be able to add further admins' is translated as 'තවදුරටු පරිපාලකයන් එකතු කිරීමට'.  While understandable, a more concise and idiomatic phrasing would improve clarity. It is too literal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing as 'අනතුරු පරිපාලකයන් යෙදවීමට' or 'ඊළඟ පරිපාලකයන් යෙදවීමට'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tag `<1>` and `</1>` are not standard and appear to be an artifact of the original content handling. They need to be removed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the `<1>` and `</1>` tags surrounding 'click here'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "To be able to add further admins" is translated as "Ak chcete mať možnosť pridávať ďalších administrátorov". While not strictly incorrect, it's a bit verbose. A more natural translation would be something like 'Pre pridávanie ďalších administrátorov'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pre pridávanie ďalších administrátorov

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'click here' is translated as 'kliknite sem'.  While technically correct, it sounds a little formal for user interface copy. A more conversational alternative would be 'kliknite' or 'ďalej'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: kliknite

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'upgrade your tariff plan' is translated as 'aktualizujte svoj tarifný plán'. While acceptable, it could be more naturally rendered as 'navýšte svoj tarifný plán'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: navýšte svoj tarifný plán

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags <1> and </1> are not properly closed or valid HTML. They are likely intended to indicate a hyperlink.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace <1>click here with a proper hyperlink using tags, e.g., click here. The specific URL should be inserted into the href attribute.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Корисничким дозволама' is a bit clunky. While technically correct, a more natural phrasing might improve readability. 'Кориснички права' or 'права корисника' might be preferable depending on the context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'Корисничким дозволама' with 'Кориснички права' or 'права корисника'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'User permissions only' is translated as 'Korisničkim dozvolama'. While technically correct, it's less clear and might be better conveyed as 'samo korisničkim pravima' to maintain clarity in Serbian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kada se dostigne limit, svi korisnici će biti dodati sa samo korisničkim pravima.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags <1>click here</1> are inconsistent with standard HTML formatting. The correct tag should be <a>. The number within the tag seems irrelevant.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kada se dostigne limit, svi korisnici će biti dodati sa samo korisničkim pravima. Da biste mogli dalje da dodajete admine, kliknite ovde da biste nadogradili vaš tarifni plan.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "To be able to add further admins" is not perfectly translated. "Daha fazla yönetici ekleyebilmek için" is a bit clunky. A more natural Turkish phrasing would be something like "Daha fazla yönetici eklemek için".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Daha fazla yönetici eklemek için

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags `<1>` and `</1>` are not standard and might not render correctly. They appear to be intended to highlight a link.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more standard HTML link tag, e.g., `[link text]` or adjust the rendering to handle the custom tags.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tag `<1>` is inconsistent. The English uses `<1>click here</1>` while the Ukrainian uses `<1>натисніть тут</1>`. The surrounding HTML tag is not standardized.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Standardize the HTML tag to match the English: `<1>click here</1>` or `<1>натисніть тут</1>` consistently throughout all similar instances.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Once the limit is reached, all users will be added with User permissions only" is not accurately reflected in the Chinese translation. The current translation, '所有新添加用户将仅具有用户权限', implies that *newly added* users are the ones limited to User permissions, not *all* users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 一旦达到限制，所有用户都将仅具有用户权限。(Yīdàn dádào xiànzhì, suǒyǒu yònghù dōu jiāng jǐn yǒu yònghù quánxiàn.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags <1>click here</1> are inconsistent with typical formatting for a clickable link in Chinese UI.  The original English used `<1>click here</1>`, which is unusual for English too.  It's best to use more standard link formatting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 点击此处升级您的资费计划 (Diǎnjī chéngcǐ gēngjí nín de zīfèi jìhuà)
